resources.string: We are organising an event known as TECHNOBEAT which is a very lively technical festival of 2 days (1st- 2nd Feb). It comprises of a series of technical events that are aimed at entertainment and cultivation of good taste in general knowledge of the students and giving them opportunities to manifest their technical skills.

1. Black Coding: Description- It’s a C++ Coding based event where, the participant has to code with the monitor screen turned off. • Entry fee: Rs. 30  Event Heads:  Shivangi Tripathi : +917208128895  Shivani Shingare: +918286491884
